code: @Override public void onReceive(Object message) {     if (message instanceof Terminated) {         try {             Terminated term = (Terminated) message.             String name = term.actor().path().toSerializationFormat().             if (log != null) {                 log.error("Actor " + name + " terminated, stopping process...").                 // give the log some time to reach disk                 try {                     Thread.sleep(100).                 } catch (InterruptedException e) {                 // not really a problem if we don't sleep...                 }             }         } finally {             System.exit(exitCode).         }     } }
